name: Big Bang
description: Players receive a free reroll each round, loot orbs from all minions and monsters, and a Force of Nature on stage 3. Free rerolls cannot be saved.

name: Galactic Armory
description: All players start with a Rare box contains 3 component items. All players receive the same 3 items.

name: Manatee's Delight
description: All players receive a free Spatula at the start of the game.

name: Plunder Planet
description: All champions have a chance to drop a coin, especially the first one.

name: Salvage World
description: Selling a champion also breaks all of their finished items into components.

name: Superdense
description: On reaching stage 3â€“1, players receive a Rare box containing a Force of Nature.

name: Trade Sector
description: All players receive one free reroll per round. Free rerolls cannot be saved up.

name: Treasure Trove
description: All minions and monsters drop a loot orb.

name: Binary Star
description: Each champion is automatically given an permanent Unusable Slot

name: Dwarf Planet
description: The nearest and farthest rows on every board are impassable. Units cannot be placed in impassable hexes during planning and cannot enter them during combat.

name: Lilac Nebula
description: The first carousel contains only 4 cost units.

name: Littler Little Legends
description: Little Legends are smaller and faster, and start with only 85 health.

name: Medium Legends
description: Little Legends are larger and have 125 health.

name: Star Cluster
description: 1, 2, and 3 cost units on carousels have two stars. The second carousel only has 2 cost units.

name: The Neekoverse
description: All players receive a Rare box contains two copies of Neeko's Help at the start of the game.
